name: InfraRED (itch)
description:
You are in a pitch-black world with only a LiDAR (light detection and ranging) scanner which can shoot infrared beams to reveal more about your surroundings. Your objective is to find all 3 coins that are hidden around the maps.

This game is made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 with the theme "You're not alone"

Controls:
WASD / Arrow keys: Walk, move forward to run
Left click: Scan
Escape: Pause / Unpause
